name: 3876 AD: Corruption
summary: A hardcore military sci-fi survival roguelike set in the post-apocalyptic world of 3876 AD. Engage in tense tactical combat, scavenge for resources, complete dangerous quests, and explore an immersive lore full of dark themes and meaningful decisions.

name: .38 Ambush Alley
summary: .38 Ambush Alley is a game for the Action Max. As a VHS tape, the on-screen action is not interactive, rather, scores are tallied when the console's TV-mounted sensor detects "hits" and "friendly fire".

name: 38 Man Kilo no Kokuu File 1: A Day in the Life of 2049
summary: A sci-fi adventure game that is the fifth installment in System Sacom's Novel Ware franchise.

name: 38M Girls Project
summary: 38M Girls Project is an upcoming Japanese action role-playing game. The game is a collaborative work between Dingo, Aniplex Mobile, and DMM Games.
